content: Please provide a summary of all Kubernetes resources by usingg kubernetes_* that are currently running within the namespace named {{namespace_name}}.
title: Provide Kubernetes resource details for specific namespace

content: Please analyze falco events by using falco_* tools and checking data between {{start_time}} and {{end_time}} {{timezone}} on {{date}} {{year}}. please analyze events and let me know if there was a breach in my environment in that specific time frame and please help to reconstruct the whole attack.
title: Investigate security incident with specific time frame
